transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+6% Ally Team Effectiveness
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
Increases damage proportional to Effectiveness (Max 100%)
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
Burst Level 3 Unlocked
+50 Action Points, +20 Chain Points at battle start
Increases damage proportional to Effectiveness (Max +100%)
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
Increases caster's Health by 35%
Increases Priority of the caster by 40% when hit by an attack that targets all enemies (Once per turn)
transcend.4_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +16%
味方の効果命中+6%
チェーンパッシブのWGダメージ+1
効果命中が高いほどダメージUP(最大100%までUP)
transcend.4_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +16%
아군 효과 적중 +6%
체인 패시브의 WG 감소량 +1
효과 적중 비례 피해 증가 (최대 100%)
transcend.5_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +22%
バーストスキル3段階解禁
戦闘開始時、AP+50、CP+20
効果命中が高いほどダメージUP(最大100%までUP)
transcend.5_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +22%
버스트 3단계 해금
입장 시 AP +50 , CP +20
효과 적중 비례 피해 증가 (최대 +100%)
transcend.6_jp:
ATK DEF HP +30%
自分のHP+35%
全体攻撃を受けた場合、自分の行動ゲージ+40%
(1ターンに一度のみ発動)
transcend.6_kr:
ATK DEF HP +30%
자신 체력 증가 +35%
전체 공격 피격 시 자신 행동 게이지 +40% (1턴에 1회)

SKT_FIRST.name: False Grace
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies with <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color>, and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
description: Attacks 2 enemies with <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color>, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000091_1_2]</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000091_1_2] turn(s)</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 <color=#28d9ed>강격</color>으로 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>효과 적중</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다. 이 스킬은 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵2体に<color=#28d9ed>強撃</color>でダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>効果命中</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Rules of Salvation
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies with <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color>. Has a <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> chance to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, and a <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of all targets by <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Inflicts reduced Defense on the target for 2 turns

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Reduces buff duration of the target by 2 turns before attacking
SKT_BURST_2.effect_kr: 대상 강화 효과 지속 -2턴 후 공격
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 対象の強化効果ターンを-2ターン後、攻撃

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nInflicts Stunned on the target for 1 turn
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n対象にスタン+1ターン

description: Attacks all enemies with <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color>. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000091_2_1]</color> chance to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000091_2_1] turn(s)</color>, and a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000091_2_2]</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of all targets by <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 <color=#28d9ed>강격</color>으로 공격합니다. <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 해제 불가능한 <color=#28d9ed>강화 불가</color>를 부여하고, <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> 확률로 대상 모두의 <color=#28d9ed>스킬 쿨타임</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 증가시킵니다. 이 스킬은 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>強撃</color>でダメージを与える。<color=#28d9ed>75%</color>の確率で敵全体に解除不可能な<color=#28d9ed>強化不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与し、<color=#28d9ed>75%</color>の確率で対象のすべての<color=#28d9ed>スキルターン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>増加させる。このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: I Am the Sole Perfection
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> chance to remove 1 <color=#28d9ed>buff</color> from all enemies, and attacks all enemies with <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color>. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack, and right after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.
description: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000091_3_1]</color> chance to remove 1 <color=#28d9ed>buff</color> from all enemies, and attacks all enemies with <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color>. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000091_3_2]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000091_3_2] turn(s)</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack, and right after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> 확률로 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 1개 해제하고 적 전체를 <color=#28d9ed>강격</color>으로 공격합니다. 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> 확률로 적 전체를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>스턴</color> 상태로 만듭니다. 이 스킬은 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가하고, 이 스킬 직후에는 적의 반격, 복수, 신속 대응이 발동하지 않습니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: <color=#28d9ed>75%</color>の確率で敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を1個解除し、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>強撃</color>でダメージを与える。攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>75%</color>の確率で敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>スタン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPし、このスキルでは敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応が発動しない。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack, and when attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack, and applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack, and when attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000091_chain_1_1]</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000091_backup_1_1]</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000091_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack, and applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 자신의 스킬 체인 공격이 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가하며, 공격 시 대상에게 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> 만큼의 고정 피해를 입힙니다. 해당 공격은 <color=#28d9ed>강격</color>으로 적용됩니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>효과 적중</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다. 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가하고, <color=#28d9ed>강격</color>으로 적용됩니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:自分のチェーンスキルが攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPし、攻撃時、対象に対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>8%</color>の固定ダメージを与える。このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>強撃</color>の攻撃判定になる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>効果命中</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPする。このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>強撃</color>の攻撃判定になる。
